name: df-pred
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cpred(c0, c1, c2), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(c2))))
comment: Define the predecessor class of a relationship. This is the class of all elements ` y ` of ` A ` such that ` y R X ` (see ~ elpred ) . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
